ygData.subject: RE: Zanderion MIA?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone and especially to Ziltus :) I go MIA now and you come back? LOL This list seems to have goine quiet for some reason...hmm... Anyway for those
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone and especially to Ziltus :)
 
I go MIA now and you come back? LOL
This list seems to have goine quiet for some reason...hmm...
 
Anyway for those wondering...yes i'm still alive and well thank you
I've been very busy of late...work has gotten very time consuming as financial markets have
been very active last few months..something's always happening. Also i've started a business of
my own in a sense...it's still only a fledgling kinda busines...mostly freelance but basically i do hardware
assembly and computer system sales..yeah it even comes with service hehe...yep thats it.
With my real job and this start-up combined....i'm really drained of any spare time...it's certainly not enough
time to go EQ and join in a slay the dragons night or something..barely 1 hour free a night these days.
 
Whatever free time i can spare usually goes to my girlfriend and yes some Unreal Tournament...man this is a GREAT game!
Not too time consuming if you can't spare the time and yet a major kickass fun game...especially CTF games.
Anyone who plays UT on local servers pls contact me :) I use my nice Zanderion for UT as well.
 
I might return to EQ given the time...who knows i might try ROK...not too sure though...sometimes i think
EQ has become like a schedule...time to do this..book to do that..it's totally non-RPG anymore.
I miss those days i could go hunt with some guys and not have to think of schedules and stuff...
when since did knights and wizards in RPG have to book a date???? Totally crazy when you really care to admit it.
 
Well i hope all of you are well and should anyone wanna buy a computer system...send me a mail :)
Can give you guys some discount hehe..got all sorts of systems..high end low end etc....
So till next time..cya all and have fun!
 
Zanderion
mostly-retired lvl 50 magi on innorruk (till ROK at least)
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW [mailto:leekw13@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 3:00 PM
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List'
Subject: [sg-everquest] Need partner to lvl at WK (Innoruuk server)

From: LKW <leekw13@...>

Hi guys,

I've tested last night, from I login till I logout, I can solo both Ulir
and Ein at WK using DD and Jboot.  However, the down time is too long (Ulir
need 2.5 bubb mana on avaerage, and Ein need 4 bubb mana).  The worst case
is I managed to kill Ein with OOM.

Considering the long down time of mediating after taking every Ein, I
invited a lvl 31 driud, helping him to snare Ulir for him to kite.  Then
once he finish Ulir, I will start on Ein.

This is a pretty good lvling method, as both of us enjoyed fast xp last
night.  Now I would like to invite any lvl 30ish member who can join me for
training.  I dun mind taking more fraction hits for snaring Ulir, coz the
loneliness is really driving me mad, esp when the perverts are not online
to spam the guildsay.

Another alternative is another lvl 35-40 member, we team and take Ulir and
Ein together.  Shouldn't be a problem, this method dun even need kiting.

So, anyone interested?


Ziltus
The lonely kiting pervert in WK

p/s: My login time will be S'pore time 9pm till 1am.  So guys, I'm coming
back for good.  Any spare stuffs pls donate to me lah! ;P
Singapore Everquest Players List
